name: Awesitechat
tagline: A horror site danmu project base on Vue.js & Wilddog
body:
# AweSiteChat

> A Vue.js & Wilddog project

## Build Setup

``` bash
# install dependencies
npm install

# serve with hot reload at localhost:8080
npm run dev

# build for production with minification
npm run build

# run unit tests
npm run unit

# run e2e tests
npm run e2e

# run all tests
npm test
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
